title: Chibiverse
overview: Chibiverse features iconic Disney television characters in adorable "chibi-form" while they celebrate some of their best adventures. The chibi characters, which are from various franchises, get created in a lab out of the remnants of Disney characters found in a vault. Appearances include Phineas and Ferb, Cricket Green from "Big City Greens," Penny Proud from "The Proud Family: Louder and Prouder," and Sharpay Evans from "High School Musical."
